rules_text:
Discipline [i](This creature gains abilities from its types. Whenever it enters or you put a counter on it, it gains your choice of these types.)[/i]
[b]Cleric[/b] | Whenever you cast a spell or activate an ability that targets this creature, copy that spell or ability. You may choose new targets for the copy.
[b]Warrior[/b] | Pay 4 life: Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt to target permanent this turn.
